tool_description: An API showing the latest release dates of episodes or upcoming animes
name: Anime Release
title: Anime Release

api_list.name: Get All Anime Releases
api_list.description: It will get all the latest anime releases
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-release.p.rapidapi.com/anime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-release.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://anime-release.p.rapidapi.com/anime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "anime-release.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
